Message:
When I wear the hat, it’s like
she’s right there beside me...
Almost as if my nerves
are melting away.

Not all of them, but I do feel
like some weight’s being lifted.

Well, it’s not like
I’d ever tell her...

I mean, she’d never let me
live it down if I did.

But one day, when I’m able
to master my magic...
I’d like to thank her properly.

Right as I was getting lost
in my thoughts,
I heard shouts outside my house.
What was going on?

Fearfully creaking
the door open,
I saw armor-clad humans
fighting witches.

Screams and curses echoed
throughout the air,
as if our village
had become a battlefield...

I knew I had to run,
but my body was frozen.

Did someone actually
come to help me...?

Scrambling into my house,
one of the other
witches locked eyes
with me and pleaded.

“Quickly, wipe out
the humans with your power.
The village is in
your hands now.”
